first.speaker: Generator
first.content: Oh no! The moon is awaken.. we can't beat it by just making a simple ladder now.

12.speaker: Generator
12.content: Don't worry, I found some guys who can shoot.. with shots.

13.speaker: Generator
13.content: Just press [color=red]ENTER or F[/color] when their shots are ready and shining.

14.speaker: Generator
14.content: It would take some time for them to prepare the shot, remember to [color=red]wait[/color] until they stop rotating the shot
